4 #include "KSReadValue.h"

6 #include <string>
7 using std::string;

9 #include <map>
10 using std::map;

12 namespace Kassiopeia

14 
15  template< class XType >
16  class KSReadSet;
17 
18  template< class XType >
19  class KSReadSet< KSReadValue< XType > >
20  {
21  protected:
22  typedef map< std::string, KSReadValue< XType > > ValueMap;
23  typedef typename ValueMap::iterator ValueIt;
24  typedef typename ValueMap::const_iterator ValueCIt;
25  typedef typename ValueMap::value_type ValueEntry;
26 
27  public:
28  KSReadSet();
29  ~KSReadSet();
30 
31  public:
32  KSReadValue< XType >& Add( const std::string& aLabel );
33  KSReadValue< XType >& Get( const std::string& aLabel ) const;
34  bool Exists( const std::string& aLabel) const;
35 
36  protected:
37  mutable ValueMap fValueMap;
38  };
39 
40  template< class XType >
41  KSReadSet< KSReadValue< XType > >::KSReadSet() :
42  fValueMap()
43  {
44  }
45  template< class XType >
46  KSReadSet< KSReadValue< XType > >::~KSReadSet()
47  {
48  }
49 
50  template< class XType >
51  KSReadValue< XType >& KSReadSet< KSReadValue< XType > >::Add( const std::string& aLabel )
52  {
53  ValueIt tIt = fValueMap.find( aLabel );
54  if( tIt == fValueMap.end() )
55  {
56  return fValueMap[ aLabel ];
57  }
58  readermsg( eError ) << "value with label <" << aLabel << "> already exists" << eom;
59  return tIt->second;
60  }
61  template< class XType >
62  KSReadValue< XType >& KSReadSet< KSReadValue< XType > >::Get( const std::string& aLabel ) const
63  {
64  ValueIt tIt = fValueMap.find( aLabel );
65  if( tIt != fValueMap.end() )
66  {
67  return tIt->second;
68  }
69  readermsg( eError ) << "value with label <" << aLabel << "> does not exist" << eom;
70  return tIt->second;
71  }
72  template< class XType >
73  bool KSReadSet< KSReadValue< XType > >::Exists( const std::string& aLabel ) const
74  {
75  ValueIt tIt = fValueMap.find( aLabel );
76  if( tIt != fValueMap.end() )
77  {
78  return true;
79  }
80  return false;
81  }

89  typedef KSReadSet< KSReadValue< int > > KSIntSet;

91  typedef KSReadSet< KSReadValue< long > > KSLongSet;
92  typedef KSReadSet< KSReadValue< float > > KSFloatSet;
93  typedef KSReadSet< KSReadValue< double > > KSDoubleSet;
94  typedef KSReadSet< KSReadValue< KThreeVector > > KSThreeVectorSet;
